author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify the validation codes of HGCalValidation in the test directory and make them useful only for D88 and beyond

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special;
title: Phase2-hgx325D Modify the validation codes of HGCalValidation in the test directory and make them useful only for D88 and beyond
